title: PrivateChannelOnUnsubscribe Event
description: An event message from the Desktop Agent to an app indicating that another app has unsubscribed a context listener from a specific PrivateChannel.

privateChannelId.title: Private Channel Id
privateChannelId.description: The Id of the PrivateChannel that the listener was unsubscribed from.

contextType.title: Context type
contextType.description: The type of the context listener unsubscribed from the channel by another app, or null if it was listening to all types.
